name: Afterworld
summary: The year is 2070 and the world has barely made it to this day. First we implanted ourselves with memory elevating nanobots. In 2036 came the electronic pulse which killed most of us. This was followed by the Robot nation. We have fought back. We have yet to win but we are on our way to a new civilization. As of 8/30/15, Afterworld has shutdown.
